participants.name: Amit Verma
participants.title: SQL Developer at Arizona Department of Education

messages.message: How do you like working for Arizona department of education?
So far so good. Good to see a Government organization upgrading their technology to the latest from where people used to fix their codes in production :)
Seems to be the time of transformation. Either upgrade or get left in the dust. So, how do I get a job offer as quickly as possible? See an upgrades needed in the recruiting and staffing process?
Are you looking for a job change? If yes than it is not the right time to come to Arizona Department of Education
Try in June Month this when Fiscal Year starts
Wow, that's totally different than what recruiters tell me. How come?
I can forward your linkedin profile to the HR department to decide.
